body_html: The conditionals need to have access to create the ops themselves because they need to construct them and connect them to control dependencies I believe. Thus, you must let the control structure function have control on when the actual ops are created.

body: The conditionals need to have access to create the ops themselves because they need to construct them and connect them to control dependencies I believe. Thus, you must let the control structure function have control on when the actual ops are created.
